text: Underworld is a 2003 American action horror movie. The movie is produced by Screen Gems and distributed by Sony Pictures Releasing. It is the first movie in the Underworld franchise. It was directed by Len Wiseman. It was released in the United States on September 19, 2003. ==Cast== * Kate Beckinsale as Selene * Bill Nighy as Viktor * Michael Sheen as Lucian ==Other websites== * * * Category:2003 action movies Category:2003 horror movies Category:2000s American action movies Category:American horror movies Category:British action movies Category:British horror movies Category:German action movies Category:German horror movies Category:Hungarian movies Category:Vampires in movies Category:Movies set in Budapest Category:Movies directed by Len Wiseman
title: Underworld (2003 movie)
